resources.string: Detect when device is flat and mirror output to be used with HUD display. \n Only usable in self mode.
Select resolution. \n To use 720p or 1080p option please also enable 720p output inside Android Auto developer settings.
Use software video decoding. Bigger compatibility but less performance.
Time out in uS of the decoder (30fps = 33333), larger number potentially fixes decoding errors but makes the interface slower on response. \n Default value is equivalent of a video working at 60fps.
No devices available or bluetooth disabled
Un-select if you would like to keep the original aspect ratio.
Select how should the day and night theme be controlled.
Specify the lux amount where the app should turn on the night theme.
Changes in light condition below this value will be ignored.
Share current device GPS data with your phone.

When activated the app will increase the audio volume with 1 step at each of the following speed limits, when slowing down it will also decrease the media volume with 1 step: 
 1) At 30 KM/H (~ 20 MPH) 
 2) At 50 KM/H (~ 30 MPH) 
 3) At 80 KM/H (~ 50MPH) 
 4) At 110 KM/H (~ 70MPH) 
 5) At 130 KM/H (~ 80MPH)
Unchecking will keep the audio on the phone.
Launch app when connected to Wifi
Only start the app when connected to a specific Wifi (leave blank for any)
Cannot connect to Headunit Server. Is it running on the phone?
Your not connected to any Wifi...
Connection to Android Auto has been terminated.
Use custom/non-standard media buttons. \n Useful for units like Joying. Fill in the keycodes to be monitored.
Workaround for slow CPU, this will disable void any audio sync setting.
Start HUR service on device boot
To save the debugging log, storage perminssion must be granted.
